metadata.title: CVE-2018-8050 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: The af_get_page() function in lib/afflib_pages.cpp in AFFLIB (aka AFFLIBv3) through 3.7.16 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segmentation fault) via a corrupt AFF image that triggers an unexpected pagesize value.

criterions.comment: afflib package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
